column1: Smoque BBQ////i feel bad giving this place 3 stars
column2: but i think i'm just a bbq snob. after having bbq in the meccas of austin
column5: this place does not come close to ranking. however
column6: i will give credit where it's due! Â the brisket is delicious
column7: probably one of the most tender i've ever had. however
column8: what lacked is the genuine smoky flavor and seasoned goodness compared to other briskets. the ribs were also very good
column9: and i'm quite picky about ribs. Get the St. Louis style ribs for sure - way more flavor than the baby back. the pulled pork was just okay. Me and my husband both enjoyed the sausage too.
